title: Qute Templating Engine Support - Now Available for Quarkus Tools for Visual Studio Code
content: Quarkus Tools for Visual Studio Code version 1.10.0 has been released on the VS Code Marketplace & Open VSX. If you haven’t seen the blog post on Quarkus Tools for Visual Studio Code - 1.10.0 release, we suggest you take a look at the marvelous features we’ve introduced in this...
